channel.title: Boo-Yah! with Carmen Murray
channel.description: From Solid Gold Studios, this is Boo-Yah! Your host Carmen Murray, together with various co-hosts, presents an insightful and fun show aimed at empowering everyone by sharing information and insights on trends that will set you and your brand up for success. Featuring interviews with industry heavyweights, they will be unpacking everything from new technologies to the latest marketing trends as well as sharing awesome case studies to get your creative juices flowing and to stay ahead of the curve. Carmen aims to celebrate Women in Tech and all movers and shakers who are disrupting the business world through learning about their journeys, sharing valuable lessons and best practice empowerment strategies to make your business stand out in the new digital age..
channel.itunes:subtitle: "Make knowledge your superpoer.
channel.itunes:author: Carmen Murray
channel.itunes:summary: From Solid Gold Studios welcome to Boo-Yah!
